<th class="table-rh" style="background: #ececec; color: black; font-weight: bold; vertical-align: middle; text-align: left;">Power saving
</th>
<td class="unknown table-unknown" colspan="10" style="background: #EEE; font-size: smaller; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;">?
</td>

<th class="table-rh" style="background: #ececec; color: black; font-weight: bold; vertical-align: middle; text-align: left;">Radeon<br/>R5 220<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-AMD_R5_200_Series_75-0"><a href="#cite_note-AMD_R5_200_Series-75">[33]</a></sup><br/>(Caicos Pro)

<td><span data-sort-value="000000002013-12-21-0000" style="white-space:nowrap">December 21, 2013</span><br/>OEM

<th>Config<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cconfig_276-0"><a href="#cite_note-cconfig-276">[f]</a></sup>

<th>Clock<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-boost_271-2"><a href="#cite_note-boost-271">[a]</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Hertz" title="Hertz">MHz</a>)
</th>

<th rowspan="2">Model<br/>(<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Codename" title="Codename">Codename</a>)

<th rowspan="2">Launch

<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br/>(<a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>)
</th>

<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2">Model<br/>(<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Codename" title="Codename">codename</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Release Date<br/>&amp; Price
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br/>&amp; <a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Transistors<br/>&amp; Die Size
</th>
<th colspan="2">Core
</th>
<th colspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Fillrate" title="Fillrate">Fillrate</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-clock_329-0"><a href="#cite_note-clock-329">[a]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-texture_fill_330-0"><a href="#cite_note-texture_fill-330">[b]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-pixel_fill_331-0"><a href="#cite_note-pixel_fill-331">[c]</a></sup>
</th>
<th colspan="3">Processing power<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-clock_329-1"><a href="#cite_note-clock-329">[a]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-FLOPS_332-0"><a href="#cite_note-FLOPS-332">[d]</a></sup><br/>(<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Floating-point_operations_per_second" title="Floating-point operations per second">GFLOPS</a>)
</th>
<th colspan="4">Memory
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><abbr title="Typical board power">TBP</abbr>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Bus<br/>interface

</th>

</th>
<th>Memory (MHz)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Core config
</th>
<th>MOperations/s
</th>
<th>MPixels/s
</th>
<th>MVertices/s
</th>
<th>MTexels/s
</th>

<th rowspan="2">Model<br/>(<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Codename" title="Codename">codename</a>)
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Release Date<br/>&amp; Price
</th>
<th rowspan="2"><a href="/wiki/Microarchitecture" title="Microarchitecture">Architecture</a><br/>&amp; <a href="/wiki/Semiconductor_device_fabrication" title="Semiconductor device fabrication">Fab</a>
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Transistors<br/>&amp; Die Size
</th>
<th>Config<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-cconfig_74-1"><a href="#cite_note-cconfig-74">[e]</a></sup>
</th>
<th>Clock<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-boost_70-3"><a href="#cite_note-boost-70">[a]</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Hertz" title="Hertz">MHz</a>)
</th>
<th>Texture (<a href="/wiki/Texel_(graphics)" title="Texel (graphics)">GT</a>/s)
</th>

<tr>
<th style="text-align:left;">Radeon 610<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-334"><a href="#cite_note-334">[209]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-335"><a href="#cite_note-335">[210]</a></sup>
</th>

<tbody><tr>
<th rowspan="2" style="width:12em">Model
</th>
<th rowspan="2">Launch
